articles.description: As the $70 million show begins filming in Melbourne, NBC Universal president Richard Ross says the company could produce up to four a year in Australia.
articles.content:
He added the companys commitment would go beyond COVID.
He noted that the COVID protocols in place on La Brea add about $300,000 to the cost of each episode, but would cost twice as much in the Stat… [+2529 chars]
